results.message: Check that the title element describes the document.

results.message: The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
results.selector: html

results.message: This table appears to be a data table. If it is meant to instead be a layout table, ensure there are no th elements, and no summary or caption.
results.selector: html > body > table

results.message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. As this table has multiple levels of th elements, you must use the headers attribute on td elements.
results.selector: html > body > table

results.message: If this table is a data table, consider using a caption element to the table element to identify this table.
